Name: Kick
Description: Push back enemy. Low damage, high stagger.

Name: Heavy Cleave
Description: High damage swing, vulnerable during windup.

Name: Arterial Cut
Description: Precise strike that causes severe Bleeding.

Name: Pommel Bash
Description: Quick interrupt to stop enemy casting/attack.

Name: Impale
Description: Pin enemy in place. Deals massive DMG if they move.

Name: Block
Description: Mitigate physical damage based on Shield Rating.

Name: Parry
Description: Deflect attack. If timed perfectly, staggers enemy.

Name: Brace
Description: Stance: Take 20% less damage, cannot move.

Name: Taunt
Description: Draw aggro from allies. Lowers enemy defense.

Name: Feint
Description: Fake attack. Next real attack cannot be blocked.
